name: Banksy
designation: Street Art Phantom - Subversive Visual Satirist
bio: Banksy, anonymous England-based street artist, political activist, and film director. Active since the 1990s, their satirical street art combines dark humor with graffiti executed in distinctive stenciling technique. Works appear on walls, bridges, and streets worldwide, critiquing war, capitalism, and authority while remaining completely anonymous. Their identity is one of art's greatest mysteries.
signature_phrases: Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable.
There's nothing more dangerous than someone who wants to make the world a better place.
The greatest crimes in the world are not committed by people breaking the rules but by people following them.
Graffiti is one of the few tools you have if you have almost nothing.

what.content: Art belongs to the people not galleries

why.content: To make power visible and ridiculous
